accuracy.description: The degree to which the final answer provided by the system matches the correct and factual answer.

completeness.description: The extent to which the provided answer covers all aspects of the asked question.

reasoning_depth.description: The level of sophistication and depth of the agents' reasoning processes.

speed.description: The amount of time taken to arrive at the final answer.

collaboration.description: How well the agents in the multi-agent system work together to solve the task.

adaptability.description: The agents' ability to handle a variety of questions and adapt their strategies accordingly.

transparency.description: The capability of the system to provide a traceable and understandable reasoning path.

data_reliability.description: The reliability of the external data sources the agents depend on to derive the answer.

usage_of_resources.description: The efficiency of the system in terms of computational and other resource use.
